import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getHistoryDetail, getCategory, getDishesOfRestaurant } from '../../action/restaurant'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function OrderDetail() { const {order, orderItems} = useSelector(state=>state.restaurant.order); const categorys = useSelector(state=>state.restaurant.categorys); const disheAll = useSelector(state=>state.restaurant.dishes_res); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {oid} = useParams(); const [status, setStatus] = useState(""); const [cid, setCid] = useState("0"); useEffect(()=>{ async function gethistoryDetails(){ const action = await getHistoryDetail(oid) console.log(action); dispatch(action); } gethistoryDetails(); }, []); useEffect(()=>{ async function getcategory(){ const action = await getCategory(localStorage.getItem("rid")); dispatch(action); } async function getDishs(){ const action = await getDishesOfRestaurant(localStorage.getItem("rid")); dispatch(action); } getDishs(); getcategory(); }, []) return (

Name User :

{order?order.order_date.substring(0,10):""}

Time :

{order?order.time_from.substring(0,5):""} - {order?order.time_to.substring(0,5):""}

Number of People :

{order?order.number_people:""}

Table :

{order?order.table.title:""}

Information of Order

{orderItems? orderItems.map((item, index)=>{ return ( ) }) :""}
Title Price Quantity Amount

{item.item}

 {item.price}$ {item.quantity} {item.total}$
SubTotal {order?order.price:0}$
Diposited {order?order.deposit:0}$
Grand Total {order?(order.price-order.deposit):0}$

The Dishes

); } export default OrderDetail;
